name: Bodhi's Basics in Edutainmint an'd otter Stuff Mod Menu
name_original: Bodhi's Basics in Edutainmint an'd otter Stuff Mod Menu
description:
Bodhi's Basics in Edutainmint an'd otter Stuff Mod Menu is a game developed by Dima Dimon. It was originally released in 2021.
Bodhi's Basics in Edutainmint an'd otter Stuff Mod Menu is available on PC, macOS and Linux. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
